title: Pablo Casals breaks his journey
creator_credit: Thorold Dickinson, United Nations. Film Board and V.R. Sarma
brief_description: Casals broke his self-imposed retirement to appear in New York at the International Concert celebrating the United Nations’ 13 Anniversary. Casals gave a brief talk on the contribution musicians can make to world peace and played the short Catalan air “Song of the Birds”.
creator_credit_for_label: Thorold Dickinson, United Nations. Film Board and V.R. Sarma
